app_detail:
Are you a cat lover? Did you always want to pet a cat? Then this is a golden chance for you! Explore these cats' playhouse and play with them. Pet them, feed them, & love themğŸ˜».

My Cat Town is a fun cat game which everybody will love. It has cute cats & kittens which everyone will adoreğŸ˜». Pretend to be a caretaker and take care of cats & kittens, play with cats all day long. There is no limit for having fun with this awesome pet game. This pet game for girls & boys is absolutely free of cost. No need to pay for anything for having fun! Amazing, isn't it?

My cat town has so many surprises for you! Enter this new pretend play pet world and discover amazing surprises when you touch on the screenğŸ¤©. Play with different cats, cat toys & kittens in this cat game. This cat pet world is perfect for kids 1, 2, 3, 4. 5. 6, 7, 8 year olds.

What you can do in this Pet Games for Girls & Boys?

ğŸ¾Play with the cute cats in the house!
Be a part of a cat's life. Pet your purring cats in the house. Play with cats along with cat playhouse, cat tree house and such many more things that cats love!

ğŸ¾Play with the cute cats in the garden!
Play with a tree house, bushes in the garden. Do outdoor activities with your cats in the garden area.

ğŸ¾Play with different cats!
You don't have to pet just one cat! There are so many different cute cats!ğŸ˜»Enjoy playing with them in my cat gamesğŸ˜¸

Features of the new pet world of cats:
ğŸ˜º100% Free
ğŸ˜ºTap, drag and interact with every object you see to discover hidden surprises.
ğŸ˜ºIdeal for little explorers of age 1, 2, 3, 4. 5. 6, 7, 8 year olds.
ğŸ˜ºAbsolutely no advertisements or pop-ups.
ğŸ˜º2 locations to play with cute cats.
ğŸ˜ºNo internet required. Play whenever you want!

If you are a true animal lover or cat lover or a pet lover you will definitely download this My Cat Town. You will never find an amazing pet game like this anywhere so, what are you waiting for? Download this My Cat TownğŸ˜¸ - Free Pet Games for Girls & Boys NOW & let the begun!

My Cat TownğŸ˜¸ - Free Pet Games for Girls & Boys is one of the best game from our My Animal Town series of games. You can also check out My Squirrel Home, My Monster Town, My Animal Town games. You'll definitely love these games!
